title: Rosemary chicken with orange glaze
ingredients: ['240 ml orange juice', '120 ml dry white wine', '120 ml maple syrup or honey', '2 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1/2 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '4 skinless, boneless chicken fillets', '2 tablespoons butter', '2 tablespoons olive oil']
